pr_title: HADOOP-17074 Optimise s3a Listing to be fully asynchronous.

timeline.message: HADOOP-17074 Optimise s3a Listing to be fully asynchronous.

timeline.author: steveloughran

timeline.bodyText: make private unless someone needs to get at these in mockito tests
timeline.author: steveloughran

timeline.bodyText: get a WriteOperationHelper instance and invoke via that
timeline.author: steveloughran
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2244,8 +2263,9 @@ public UploadInfo putObject(PutObjectRequest putObjectRequest) {
    * not be saved to the metadata store and
    * fs.s3a.metadatastore.fail.on.write.error=true
    */
+  @VisibleForTesting
   @Retries.OnceRaw("For PUT; post-PUT actions are RetryTranslated")
-  PutObjectResult putObjectDirect(PutObjectRequest putObjectRequest)
+  public PutObjectResult putObjectDirect(PutObjectRequest putObjectRequest)

timeline.bodyText: any reason to not use a local variable here?
timeline.author: steveloughran

replies.bodyText:
Initially there were two tests so I thought of reusing the class level variable and closing the fs in teardown.
Since there is just one test, I have moved to a local variable and closing using try-with-resources.
replies.author: mukund-thakur

timeline.author: steveloughran

timeline.bodyText: Add some tracking/logging of how long it took to create all these files.
timeline.author: steveloughran

timeline.bodyText: use a shorter name so the lines after are less wide
timeline.author: steveloughran
